subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: With less than a week in the regular season, a period that will determine if the Mets can laugh about September or weep through October, they are trying to find the old, electrifying José Reyes.
snippet: With less than a week in the regular season, a period that will determine if the Mets can laugh about September or weep through October, they are trying to find the old, electrifying José Reyes.
